protein.general_function: Involved in phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the phosphorylation of D-glucose to D-glucose 6-phosphate using ADP as the phosphate donor. GDP and CDP can replace ADP, but with reduced efficiency (By similarity).

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
